install_os_progress.title: Operating system install
install_os_progress.delete_msg: Are you sure you want to delete this server {{row.id}} with IP address {{row['ip-addr']}}?

help.p1: If an OS install fails on one or more servers, the failures will be reported here.
help.p2: For any control plane nodes that have failed to install you will need to fix the node and retry.
help.p3: If it is compute node that has failed, and you have another compute node that was successful, you can remove failed server from list and proceed.
help.p4: For more information on troubleshooting the operating system installation, please see the troubleshooting page.

install_os_progress.error: An error was encountered while installing your OS. Please update your configuration and try again.
install_os_progress.wait1: Please wait while your OS finishes installing.
install_os_progress.wait2: You must wait for OS installation to complete before you can move on to the next step.
install_os_progress.name: Server name
